com.myscript.atk.itc

Interface IWordUserParamsFactory


  • public interface IWordUserParamsFactory
    This interface defines a word user parameters factory as seen by the interactive text component. This interface must be implemented by the application that wants to make use of user parameters.

    The different methods of this interface will be called for each character of the corresponding SmartWord

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUserParams createCharacterUserParamsForNewTypeSetWord(SmartWord newWord, int charIndex, SmartWord oldWord)
      Creates new character user parameters from an old SmartWord for a new created typeset word.
      IUserParams createCharacterUserParamsForTransformedWord(IUserParams oldCharacterUserParams, Transform transform)
      Creates new character user parameters from an old SmartWord for a new created moved word.
      IUserParams createCharacterUserParamsForWord(IUserParams oldCharacterUserParams)
      Creates new character user parameters from old character user parameters.
      IUserParams readCharacterUserParams(byte[] userParamsBytes)
      Returns the character user parameters to assign to word being created.

    • Method Detail

      • readCharacterUserParams

        IUserParams readCharacterUserParams(byte[] userParamsBytes)
        Returns the character user parameters to assign to word being created.
        Parameters:
        userParamsBytes - A byte array representing the serialized user parameters.
        Returns:
        Character user parameters.

      • createCharacterUserParamsForNewTypeSetWord

        IUserParams createCharacterUserParamsForNewTypeSetWord(SmartWord newWord,
                                                     int charIndex,
                                                     SmartWord oldWord)
        Creates new character user parameters from an old SmartWord for a new created typeset word.
        Parameters:
        newWord - New word.
        charIndex - New word character index.
        oldWord - Original word.
        Returns:
        Newly created IUserParams.

      • createCharacterUserParamsForWord

        IUserParams createCharacterUserParamsForWord(IUserParams oldCharacterUserParams)
        Creates new character user parameters from old character user parameters.
        Parameters:
        oldCharacterUserParams - Old character user parameters.
        Returns:
        Newly created IUserParams.

      • createCharacterUserParamsForTransformedWord

        IUserParams createCharacterUserParamsForTransformedWord(IUserParams oldCharacterUserParams,
                                                      Transform transform)
        Creates new character user parameters from an old SmartWord for a new created moved word.
        Parameters:
        oldCharacterUserParams - Old character user parameters.
        transform - The Transform object to use for the transformation.
        Returns:
        Newly created IUserParams.
